GPT-5.2.name: Hannah Reed
GPT-5.2.story:
Hannah joined a small dinner in Coimbra with her host family and a neighbor, Dona Lurdes. The conversation drifted to holidays, and Hannah tried to follow along. She said, “I’m still new here, so I might confuse things—can I ask a question?”

Dona Lurdes nodded. “Claro.”

Hannah leaned forward. “What are the main differences you notice between Portugal and nearby places, in terms of daily life? Like, what feels distinctly Portuguese to you?”

As the plates were cleared, Hannah stood and offered, “I can wash dishes if you show me where things go.” Dona Lurdes handed her a dish towel and said, “Here,” and Hannah began drying plates, repeating a new word quietly to herself as she set each one in the cupboard.

Mateus shrugged. “I don’t really talk about that.”
